pages.title: Apply to the ‘Find an English-speaking funeral director abroad’ service

components.name: rhnpiT
components.content:
Funeral directors based outside the UK can apply online to be added to the Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO) 'Find an English-speaking funeral director abroad' service.

This service provides lists of English-speaking funeral directors which are searchable by country and region to help British nationals find the support that best suits their needs.

To be eligible to be added to a list you need to be:

  • based in the country you provide funeral services in
  • qualified to provide funeral services, and are registered with the local authorities to provide funeral services (if applicable in your country)

You also need to be able to provide:

  • funeral services and support to customers in English
  • reliable contact details, including an email address
! Warning You must have access to the email address you provide. You will be sent a link that you must use to complete your application.

components.name: QLkbfP
components.content:
Feedback on this service

We welcome your feedback to help us improve this service

components.name: fhWDrb
components.content:
Contact us

You can contact us to change or remove your details, or make a complaint if you are a funeral director in this service.

pages.title: Check your answers
Can you provide funeral services and support to customers in English?
You cannot be added to the service

components.name: WlXNxl
components.content: You can only be added to the 'Find an English-speaking funeral director abroad' service if you can provide services to British nationals in English

pages.title: Contact name

components.name: YBSPkn
components.content: Provide the full name of someone at the company who the British Embassy can contact about your application. This will not be published on GOV.UK.

pages.title: Company name and address

components.name: mYwfbq
components.content:
Give the address where clients can meet with you. This must match the country list you want to be added to.

This will be published on GOV.UK if you are added to the list.

pages.title: Full website address (optional)

components.name: rCHsNQ
components.content:
Enter your full web address, for example: https://www.example.com or http://www.example.com.

If you do not know the full address, open your website in a new tab and copy the link.

pages.title: Email address

components.name: CetdZQ
components.content:
This email will be used:

  • to send you a link you must use in order to submit this application
  • by the British Embassy if they need to contact you about your application

components.name: publishEmail
components.title: Can we publish this email address on GOV.UK?
components.hint: We need an email address to publish on GOV.UK so that British nationals can contact you.

pages.title: Which local services do you provide?

components.name: localServicesProvided
components.title: Local services provided
components.hint: Select all services that you provide

components.name: RuScuW
components.content: If you provide a different service that you think should be included in this list, email digitalservicesfeedback@fco.gov.uk.

pages.title: Have you provided services to British nationals before?

components.name: representedBritishNationals
components.title: Have you provided services to British nationals before?

pages.title: Phone number

components.name: RpnRxn
components.content: These details will be published on GOV.UK and used by British nationals to contact you.

components.name: phoneNumber
components.title: Phone number
components.hint: Include the country code, for example +49(0)74749561660

components.name: contactPhoneNumber
components.title: Emergency / out of hours number
components.hint: Only provide a number here if you can guarantee it will be answered outside of normal working hours.

pages.title: Are you a member of a professional association? (optional)

components.name: regulators
components.hint: Include any independent national or international associations, unions or regulatory bodies. The details you give may be checked by FCDO but will not be published on GOV.UK.
components.title: Associations, unions or regulatory bodies

pages.title: Declaration

components.name: VUylUR
components.content:
By continuing you declare that you are:

  • currently qualified to provide funeral services, or are currently registered with the local authorities to provide funeral services (if applicable in your country)
  • reliable and willing to help on a regular basis
  • able to respond within a reasonable timeframe to client requests
  • willing to update or re-confirm your details on an annual basis on request
  • aware that inclusion on the 'Find an English-speaking funeral director abroad' service is not an endorsement by the FCDO and you are not affiliated to the FCDO in any way

Read the full terms and conditions.
